body:
Out of everything on Avicus, the one thing I'm fearing are the AviPeeps. I've seen many many many people complaining about people making leaving posts just for attention, though this isnt excatly true. I've been gone for a total of 13 days and I have a feeling I need Avicus. I've had this server for an extremely long time and it was foolish of me to think it was time for it to go. I am literally afraid to come back because 85% of Avicus to me is about the community and friends. What would the point be for me to come back only for everybody to think im an attention seeking loser? I would only have 15% fun and 85% of my friends gone. The reason I made this post is because I want to see if this will actually happen. I need the AviPeeps to either hate me, or like me/ not hate me.

P.S.
I know I should've thought my leaving through. But we learn from mistakes.

P.P.S
My sister has been logging on and playing, so that's why my profile only says Last Logged on 4 days ago.
